Arrelanes traded - Hemphill is still available for sale or trade. Prices and pictures below. *Edit* Not sure why photos are coming through sideways. Happy to send more photos via email upon request.

Always open to partial or full trades for t206 HOF'ers or rare backs. 

Frank Arrelanes (SGC 3.5) - **Traded**
Charlie Hemphill (ISA 5.5) - [STRIKE]$250[/STRIKE] $225

Bump for update. Only Hemphill left
